name: Space Training!
description:
The military have designed a new weapon for space combat that will remove the need for ammunition factories. they want you to test it out!

Featuring completely deformable planets!

The theme for this Game Jam was Holes, so why not a game where everything you do requires you to dig holes?!

 Controls:

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump / Jetpack (Hold)
Left Click - Dig!
Right Click - Fire / Charge (Hold)
ESC - Pause Menu (with mouse sensitivity slider)

WARNING: You might need quite a beefy PC for this game due to the deforming mesh!
